name: external-project
author: freeCodeCamp
description: Template used for freeCodeCamp projects with the freeCodeCamp Courses VSCode extension

scripts.dev:watcher: export ACTOR=dev || set ACTOR=dev && npm run start
scripts.dev:server: export ACTOR=dev || set ACTOR=dev && nodemon tooling/server.js
scripts.dev:curriculum: cd ../curriculum && cargo install wasm-pack && npm run build
